message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's worth it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $87.50?
